cards.front: Ray diagram rules for concave mirror?
cards.back: 1) Parallel ray reflects through F, 2) Ray through C reflects back, 3) Ray through F reflects parallel.

cards.front: Ray diagram rules for convex mirror?
cards.back: 1) Parallel ray reflects as if from F behind, 2) Ray toward F reflects parallel, 3) Ray toward C reflects back.

cards.front: Ray diagram rules for convex lens?
cards.back: 1) Parallel ray passes through F, 2) Ray through center continues straight, 3) Ray through F emerges parallel.

cards.front: Ray diagram rules for concave lens?
cards.back: 1) Parallel ray diverges as if from F, 2) Ray through center continues straight, 3) Ray toward F emerges parallel.
